See the Brochure for more information!

Located in Bathurst Industrial Park with easy access to HWY11 & 134. This property has great exposure at the industrial park entrance. This space offers a mix of freezer and dry storage along with some newly finished office space. Other features include a back up generator and a large fence compound. See the flyer for more!

Located in Bathurst Industrial Park with easy access to HWY11 & 134. This property has great exposure at the industrial park entrance. This space offers a mix of freezer and dry storage along with some newly finished office space. Other features include a back up generator and a large fence compound. See the flyer for more!
23,800 sf industrial building. Corner lot offering enhanced visibility. Opportunity to lease, own-occupy and/or develop on adjacent 2.00 acre parcel of raw land.

Situated in Oromocto, within close proximity to major highways, lies atwo-storey, 23,800 sf industrial building that lends itself to a wide variety of uses. 2,600 sf of the second level is allocated as office space, with the remaining square footage supporting industrial use at ground level. Currently the property is 100% leased to a large engineering firm.

225 Alison is strategically located in Fredericton’s industrial area with easy access to arterial routes including the TransCanada Highway; as well as key municipal streets. Minutes from uptown Fredericton amenities, this location provides the flexibility of the industrial zoning with the convenience associated with most office/commercial locations. The current tenant mix provides income diversity from established tenants.

225 Alison is strategically located in Fredericton’s industrial area with easy access to arterial routes including the TransCanada Highway; as well as key municipal streets. Minutes from uptown Fredericton amenities, this location provides the flexibility of the industrial zoning with the convenience associated with most office/commercial locations. The current tenant mix provides income diversity from established tenants.

The building is 35,518 SF was constructed in 1983,then expanded in 1988 and 1993. The foundation is a concrete slab with the exterior of the building comprising of brick masonry on the front with steel panels on the other three walls. The roof is modified stacking seam and modified bitumen. Which was redone in 2018. For Loading access, the property has to dock level doors with and additional bay door at grade level with a lift. In addition to the roof, significant upgrades have been completed to support a Multi-tenant property that appeals to variety of Tenants. These upgrades include, sprinkler, fire alarm, Roof, Ventilation and lighting. Currently the property is fully leased. Rent Rolland Property Expense can be made available upon execution of a Confidentiality Agreement.
